phare/sloggo

Syslog collector and viewer using DuckDB

Related repos

  • GitHub repo for DuckDB, an in-process SQL database system for analytics
  • Go linter for consistent log/slog code style
  • Terminal interface for log streams
  • Cross-platform log viewer and analyzer
  • Grafana Loki collects and stores logs using labeled streams for efficient querying and scalable storage
  • Rust-powered Python logging library with async, rotation, and rich filtering
  • desktop journaling app with local storage and optional AI reflections
  • Go logging library with structured output
